channel.title: Funkload on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Funkload on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Web application performance measurement tool Funkload...
item.description: # Funkload Web application performance measurement tools (along with server load), Apache BenchandSiegeandJMeter, If I was looking into StackOverflow thinking that it might be something else I found something called Funkload. Apparently made by Python. Then I tried playing around with it, asking if I would like to investigate. Operating environment maintenance As an operating environment, my own environment is as follows. Mac OS X 10.8 Python 2.7.5 Funkload seems to support Python 2.
